tp:docstring.p: GroupService object encapsulates the APIs to create or retrieve the dbus object of the group. Besides it emits signal when a group is added, deleted or updated.

signal.name: groupAdded
signal.tp:docstring: Signal is emitted when group info is added to the group's account database

signal.name: groupDeleted
signal.tp:docstring: Signal is emitted when group info is deleted from the group's account database

signal.name: groupUpdated
signal.tp:docstring: Signal is emitted when group info is updated to the group's account database

method.name: getGroup
method.tp:docstring: Gets the group dbus object based on GID

method.name: getGroupByName
method.tp:docstring: Gets the group dbus object based on group name
